pullRequest.title: Fix invidious comments
pullRequest.bodyText:
I carefully read the contribution guidelines and agree to them.
 I did test the API against NewPipe.
- [] I agree to ASAP create a PULL request for NewPipe for making in compatible when I changed the api. doesn't require any changes (except updating the version ofc)

Fixes #235, fixes TeamNewPipe/NewPipe#2817
Edit: apk if you wanna test: invidious_comments.zip

commit.message: fix:invidious: getID and onAccpetURl for comments
changed getId() to remove duplicate code
